translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうだ、ここは俺とフェリスを手に入れ悪魔奴隷にした場所なのだー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's right, this is the place where I got Felis and made her a demon slave.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: むかっと怒るダークランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Dark Lance gets irritated and angry.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おっ、くるか、よし、いっちょもんでやるぞとランスが戦う気になると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh, here it comes. Alright, let's give them a fight, Lance gets ready to battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 気持ちを落ち着かせて立ち去る、お前と戦うのはまだ先だと・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He calms himself down and leaves, thinking that fighting you will have to wait...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リセット、おにいちゃん、マフラー使ってくれているんだね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reset, Onii-chan, you’re using the scarf I gave you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ばいばい、気をつけてね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bye-bye, take care.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悪魔迷宮の出口だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is the exit of the demon labyrinth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 外に出た、おっ・・カスタムの近くか・・Ｍランドはまだ遠いし
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We came outside. Oh... near Custom, huh... M-Land is still far.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍の勢力圏内じゃないか、たいして近道にならなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is inside the demon army's territory. It hasn’t exactly become a shortcut.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、どっちかというと遠回りだよと言われるが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, actually, it’s more of a detour, people say.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 楽しかったからよし、さぁ、行くぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But since it was fun, all is well. Now, let's go.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、魔軍野戦陣地
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, at the demon army’s field base.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レイのテントか建物の前で魔物兵の会話・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Conversation between demon soldiers in front of Rey's tent or building...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦い終わった、今日も俺達の勝ちだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The battle’s over. Today, we won again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも人間共の将軍、強かったな・・　（設定：グラビティソード
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But the human general was strong... (Settings: Gravity Sword)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 装甲兵が簡単にぶっとばされたし、化け物だなとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Our armored soldiers were easily knocked away; she's a monster, they said.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すげー美人なのにあんな強いんだな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She’s incredibly beautiful yet so strong.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あんな人間もいるんだな、俺達だけではどうなっていたか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There really are humans like that; if it were just us, who knows what would have happened...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でもさすが魔人レイ様だ。倒して捕まえたよ、今も中で・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But as expected of Demon Lord Rey. We defeated and captured her; she's still inside...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エッチしている声が聞こえる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We can hear the sounds of them having sex.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レイプです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s rape.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 電撃を少しまぜながら身体の自由を奪って抱く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While mixing some electric shocks, they restrain her body and embrace her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: けっして傷付けたり殺したりはしない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They never hurt or kill her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただ、横暴
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just violent and oppressive.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 声が聞こえなくなった・・終わったのかな・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The sounds have stopped... I wonder if it’s over...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しばらくしてレイが出てきた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After a while, Rey came out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後からセシルが出てくる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cecil comes out behind her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 嬢ちゃん、もう帰っていいぜ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miss, you’re free to go now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだど、私を解放すると言うのか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What? You’re saying you’re going to set me free...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 確かに私では魔人である貴方にかなわない、だが・・こんな易々解放されるなど侮辱だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Certainly, I can’t win against you, a demon lord, but... to be released so easily is an insult.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 怒るなよ、さっきまでアンアン可愛く喘いでいた女がよ、とケツを叩く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't get mad, the woman who was cutely moaning just now, he pats her butt.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きゃっ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kyaah...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 処女だったんだろ、大事な物奪ってしまったしな、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You were a virgin, right? I took something important away from you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ああ、それからアリオス君だっけ？お前がさっきつい口にした男の名前、そいつによろしくな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, and that guy, Arios, right? The man’s name you accidentally mentioned earlier. Say hi to him for me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前いい女だから処女でなくなってもちゃんと迫れば愛してくれると思うぜ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You’re a good woman, so even if you’re no longer a virgin, if you properly pursue him, he’ll love you, I think.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・むかっ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...grr.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おっと、その剣も忘れずにもってかえれよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oops, don’t forget to take that sword with you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺の雷撃の直撃を受けても砕けずにいるとはすごい剣だわ、大切にしな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s an amazing sword that didn’t shatter even after a direct hit from my lightning strike. Take good care of it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後、１０年修行して強くなったらもう一度挑んでくるがいい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Train for another ten years, get stronger, and then come challenge me again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぷりぷりしながら立ち去るセシル
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cecil storms off, pouting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 部下が隊長いいんですか、逃がしてしまって、あんな強い人間　俺達困りますよ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Subordinate: Captain, is it alright to let her go? Such a strong human could be trouble for us...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 部下が報告、大将軍ピサロ様から伝言です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A subordinate reports: A message from Generalissimo Pizarro.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔剣カオスを持ち何名かの魔人を撃退した人間の特別部隊が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A special human unit wielding the demon sword Chaos has repelled several demons.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この自由都市にやってきたとの事です、気をつけるようにと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They have arrived at this free city. Be cautious, they said.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほう・・さっきの嬢ちゃんより強いのかな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh... I wonder if they’re stronger than that girl from before.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: せめてあの嬢ちゃんの３倍は強くないとつまらんな、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They’d have to be at least three times as strong as that girl or it’d be boring.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ああ、いい女だったら捕まえてまたやるのもいいか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yeah, if she’s a good woman, maybe we’ll catch her again and take our chance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と余裕な感じ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They seem confident.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: Ｍランドに到着する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We arrive at M-Land.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 遊園地は閉鎖状態、Ｍランドに関する感想
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The amusement park is closed—a few impressions about M-Land.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの印象、０３で遊んだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance’s impression: I played here in 03.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ６でコパンドンが買った、ランス用のアトラクション
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In 06, Copandon bought an attraction for Lance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今は自由都市連合の臨時司令部になっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now it has become the temporary headquarters of the Free City Alliance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっちこっちに軍隊や傭兵が居る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are troops and mercenaries here and there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バラバラな感じの印象、各都市国家毎に服装は違うし
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The impression is disorganized; each city-state has different clothing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 傭兵団はもとよりバラバラだし、他の国とはだいぶ違う感じ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The mercenary groups are especially fragmented, and it feels quite different from other countries.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コパンドンに案内されて本部に行く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Guided by Copandon, I go to the headquarters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 各都市長の紹介をうまくして下さい、ランスに媚びを売る物、警戒する物など
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please introduce the mayors of each city well—those who flatter Lance, those who are wary, and so on.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 協調性が取れず、裏切り者もいるのではと疑心暗鬼な状態
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In a state of distrust, unsure if there are traitors due to lack of cooperation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスにたいして、ごめんなまとめきれずにとコパンドン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Copandon apologizes to Lance, saying sorry for not being able to summarize it all.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ああ、それからアリオス君だっけ？お前がさっきつい口にした男の名前、そいつによろしくな。

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・むかっ
